price: (Allāhu sọ pé): “Mo fi ìṣẹ̀mí ìwọ (Ànábì Muhammad) búra;¹ dájúdájú wọ́n kúkú wà nínú ìṣìnà àti àìmọ̀kan wọn, tí wọ́n ń pa rìdàrìdà.”
footnotes: 1. Ti Allāhu - subhānahu wa ta‘ālā - ni kí Ó fi ohun tí Ó bá fẹ́ búra. TiRẹ̀ sì ni kí Ó fí ẹni tí Ó bá fẹ́ búra. Àmọ́ àwa ẹ̀dá Rẹ̀ kò gbọ́dọ̀ fi n̄ǹkan mìíràn lẹ́yìn Rẹ̀ búra gẹ́gẹ́ bí a kò ṣe gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún n̄ǹkan mìíràn lẹ́yìn Rẹ̀.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
